newsitem.title: CANADA: Bre-X shares will not resume on TSE today.
newsitem.headline: Bre-X shares will not resume on TSE today.

text.p: Bre-X Minerals Ltd shares will not resume trading on the Toronto Stock Exchange on Tuesday due to technical considerations, TSE officials said.
"This is nothing to do with company news or anything," said TSE spokeswoman Jane Wong.
The stock was trading on the Nasdaq, Montreal and the Alberta exchanges.

Huge trading volume in Bre-X shares when it resumed at 1030 EST/1530 GMT caused the computer trading systems at the TSE to crash 24 minutes later. Bre-X last traded at 1052 EST/1552 GMT, up 1.35 at 3.85.
Volume for that first 22 minutes of trade totalled 7.78 million shares.
